revised_title: Comparing and Analyzing Bridges: Pont St. Esprit, Avignon, and Rome
tldr: In this letter, Mr. Tankred Robinson provides a detailed account of the Pont St. Esprit bridge and compares it to other bridges in Rome. He discusses the structural differences and factors that contribute to their stability, such as the number of arches, the placement of supporting structures, and the impact of the rivers they cross.
